stoneAxe.name: Stone Axe
stoneAxe.description: A simple axe. Increases wood gathering by 50%.

metalDetector.name: Metal Detector
metalDetector.description: A device that helps find metal. Increases scrap finding by 20%.

waterPurifier.name: Water Purifier
waterPurifier.description: A device to turn contaminated water into a drinkable resource.

furnace.name: Furnace
furnace.description: Used to smelt ores and scrap metal into ingots.

radio.name: Radio
radio.description: Can pick up strange signals and story fragments.

generator.name: Generator
generator.description: Provides power to your automated systems.

droneBay.name: Drone Bay
droneBay.description: Launches scavenger drones to automatically find resources.

hydroponicsBay.name: Hydroponics Bay
hydroponicsBay.description: An automated bay that grows edible plants.

miningRig.name: Mining Rig
miningRig.description: An automated rig that extracts resources from the earth.

crudeMap.name: Crude Map
crudeMap.description: Unlocks the ability to travel to new locations.

ironPlates.name: Iron Plates
ironPlates.description: Reinforced plates of solid iron. Used for heavy construction.

biomassCompressor.name: Biomass Compressor
biomassCompressor.description: A machine that unlocks the ability to create biomass.

pickaxe.name: Pickaxe
pickaxe.description: A sturdy tool for breaking rocks and finding ore.

kitchen.name: Kitchen
kitchen.description: A clean space for preparing nutritious meals from wasteland ingredients.
